entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
